page.title: 18Churches in Haltwhistle.
page.content: My dad is the Pastor at the {Bethshan Church. }We go to church twice on a Sunday: morning and night We go on a Tuesday night as well. We sing songs at church and my Dad stands up and talks to the people. About twelve people go to listen. There is a{United Reformed Church}on Westgate. It has fifty members and has a service at 9.30 on a Sunday morning. It shares a minister with the United Reformed Church at Brampton. The{Assembly Mission}up the West End is called the "Tin Mission" because it is built of corrugated iron. A lorry ran into the side of it this year and badly damaged it. There is a little{Methodist Church in Park Village. It has a service on a Sunday evening and a Sunday School for the children in the village and near by farms.
